ProjectTitle: Electrocatalytic dehydrogenative coupling of olefins to dienes
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/05/2024
Data: Will you use materials/samples? please list these in the tabel as well, they are considered physical data in the context of a DMP
Preservation: preservation of data on a external hard drive is not very safe, please have a look at the storage guide for alternatives (https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en) or consider using a data repository such as RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you make your data available for reuse which also ensured data preservation, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing 
Sharing: a DOI is normally added to the dataset in a repository, your publications get a different DOI which is not in the scope of a DMP
label: good with suggestions
